game.name: Luminare
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In this stylized action RPG, travel through distorted forests dungeons, and more, equipped with robust weapons each possessing their own unique style, while searching for shards to the sacred realm of Luminare.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this stylized action RPG, travel through distorted forests dungeons, and more, equipped with robust weapons each possessing their own unique style, while searching for shards to the sacred realm of Luminare.
